name: File Sharing Man
description: BOT Multi Force Subs File Sharing Bot is useful for storing files and can be accessed through a special link

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Input Bot token, obtain it from t.me/BotFather

OWNER.description: Input Telegram Username for BOT Owner [Do not use @]

ADMINS.description: Input User ID to grant Admin rights to the BOT [Use space as a separator for User IDs]

PROTECT_CONTENT.description: To prevent bot users from downloading/forwarding/screenshotting sent content [If you want to enable, change to True]

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL.description: Input ID of the Channel or Group for Forced Subscription, If you don't want to use Fsub, fill in with 0

FORCE_SUB_GROUP.description: Input ID of the Group for Forced Subscription, If you don't want to use Fsub, fill in with 0

START_MESSAGE.description: /start message to initiate conversation with the bot, Use HTML parse mode format
START_MESSAGE.value: Hello {first} I can store private files in a specific channel, and other users can access them through a special link.

FORCE_SUB_MESSAGE.description: Force Subscribe bot message, Use HTML parse mode format
FORCE_SUB_MESSAGE.value: Hello {first} You must join my Channel/Group to use me Please Join the Channel first
